pageContext.description: Late Bronze age spearhead, 297mm long, 53mm wide and 28mm thick. The spearhead is in good condition with a brown patina and weighs 345 grams. The blade measures 220mm and is 1mm thick at its edge widening to 8mm where it meets the shaft. The shaft tapers gently in width,  28mm in diameter at its base and 5mm at the tip, and has a small ridge running along each side where it meets the blade. The socket has two holes 5mm in diameter, 39mm from the edge.  There is a small amount of damage and corrosion along the base of the socket and one side has patches of red and green corrosion across its centre.
